results.name: Number of permutations in S_n that avoid the pattern 52341.
link: Zvezdelina Stankova-Frenkel and Julian West, <a href="http://arxiv.org/abs/math/0103152">A new class of Wilf-equivalent permutations, arXiv:math/0103152 [math.CO], 2001.
mathematica: avoid[n_, pat_] := Module[{p1 = pat[[1]], p2 = pat[[2]], p3 = pat[[3]], p4 = pat[[4]], p5 = pat[[5]], lseq = {}, i, p,
xref: Representatives for the 16 Wilf-equivalence patterns of length 5 are given in A116485, A047889, and A256195-A256208.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 19 2015
